arStrings.szText: {c_important}Crushing Hand{/c} grants a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} equal to {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} of the damage it deals for {c_number}{buffduration:BARRIER}{/c} seconds, up to {c_number}[{SF_13} * 100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([PlayerHealthMax() * SF_13]){/c}.
{c_important}Crushing Hand's{/c} damage increases by {c_number}[{SF_9}*100|x%|]{/c} for every stack of {c_important}{u}Resolve{/u}{/c} you have, up to {c_number}[{SF_9}*{SF_10}*100|x%|]{/c}.
Enemies hit by both strikes of {c_important}Crushing Hand{/c} are Knocked Down for {c_number}{SF_8}{/c} seconds.
